name: Strip Solitaire 2
description:
Play solitaire while your waifu strips for you, beat the game to unlock costumes for her, and remember: the harder it gets, the more coins you get ;D

In this beta version you'll find:
- 4 costumes
- 1 game mode
- 2 difficulty levels


When will be the full version available?
The full version will be released on 28 August at full price.

What can you expect from the full version?
At least 6 more costumes, 1 more game mode and more stability.
